target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To add a Workflow Question and Responses to the Review State:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the ICEcore Administration portlet, click the plus sign (+) to the left of Form and view designers to expand this section and view the available designers.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the ICEcore Administration portlet, click the plus sign (+) to the left of Form and view designers to expand this section and view the available designers.

target.name: Step
target.text: Expand Workflow process and click State - Review.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the options dialog on the right, click Add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the Data name (approve_request) and the Question text (Do you approve of this request?) and click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the Data name (approve_request_yes) and the Response text (Yes) and click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat steps 9-12 to add a "No" response to this Workflow question.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the __transition_on_question field, type in the Data name for your Workflow question (approve_request).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Transition on response field, type in the Data name for your Workflow response (approve_request_yes).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the To State drop-down list, select the state to which you are transitioning (Approve).

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat this procedure to add a Transition on response for the "No" Workflow response (approve_request_no) that transitions to the Deny state.

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Under State - Review > Transitions, click the first Manual transition.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under State - Review > Transitions, click the first Manual transition.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the options dialog on the right, click Delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the confirmation dialog that appears, click OK to delete the Manual transition.

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat this procedue to delete the remaining Manual transition for the Review state.
